title: ğŸ“£ Infinitum Policy Update: Box Battles & Guest Boxes
description:
ğŸ“¢ **Official PSA â€” Policy on Box Battles & Guest Box Participation**

Effective immediately, Infinitum LIVE Creator Network will **not** join or moderate any battle-box or box-battle events hosted by accounts outside our network. Additionally, Infinitum will no longer schedule or promote battle-box sessions of our own.

**Why this change matters**
1. **Earnings Impact** â€“ Battle-box revenue now diverts a larger share to the host, so you earn **significantly less** than in standard 1-to-1 battles or solo LIVE sessions.
2. **Monthly LIVE-Time Compliance** â€“ Minutes spent as a *guest* in someone elseâ€™s box **do not count** toward Infinitumâ€™s required monthly LIVE-time thresholds. Only hours streamed from your own host window are credited.
3. **Algorithmic Performance** â€“ Appearing in boxesâ€”especially when cameras are switched offâ€”lowers viewer retention and **suppresses your reach on the For You Page**.
4. **Brand & Viewer Experience** â€“ Camera-off boxes hurt professionalism and viewer trust.

**Infinitumâ€™s stance**
â€¢ We **do not encourage** participation in box battles under current payout and visibility conditions.
â€¢ We **will not** enter external battles to push scores, gifts, or rankings.
â€¢ We **will continue** supporting your growth through coaching, strategic 1-to-1 battles, goal tracking, and high-value LIVE formats that maximize diamonds and audience retention.

**Your next steps**
â€¢ Focus on **solo or 1-to-1 battles** hosted from your own account.
â€¢ Maintain **camera-on, high-quality streams** to drive algorithmic favorability.
â€¢ Track your hours in InfiniVIEW to ensure they count toward monthly targets.
â€¢ Direct questions to your Creator Network Manager or open a ticket in the â€œLIVE Supportâ€ Discord channel.

title: Infinitum LIVE TikTok Raid Chain Is LIVE! ğŸ”
description:
Hey Creators â€”

Big news. Weâ€™re launching something game-changing for our TikTok LIVE family... ğŸ¥ğŸ”¥

Introducing the Infinitum LIVE TikTok Raid Chain â€“ a community-powered, momentum-building experience where we pass viewers from one creator to the nextâ€”just like Twitch raids, but made for us and made for TikTok.

ğŸš€ Whatâ€™s a TikTok Raid?
Itâ€™s simple:
We go live back-to-back, each for 1 hour and 1 minute, and at the end of each session, you shout out the next creator and send your viewers their way.

This means:
â€¢ More eyes on your content
â€¢ More chances to go viral together
â€¢ And a tighter, more powerful creator network âœŠ

ğŸ§  How It Works:
1. You sign up for a time slot (link below).
2. You go live on TikTok at your scheduled time.
3. At the 60-minute mark:
   â€¢ Shout out the next creator
   â€¢ Pin their @handle or LIVE link in your chat
   â€¢ Encourage your viewers to â€œRAIDâ€ over to their stream
   â€¢ End your stream at 1 hour and 1 minute.

Thatâ€™s it. Your job is done, and the next creator keeps the fire going ğŸ”¥

ğŸ“… Why Join the Raid Chain?
â€¢ Grow your LIVE audience naturally
â€¢ Get discovered by other creatorsâ€™ communities
â€¢ Be part of a daily content wave that TikTokâ€™s algorithm loves
â€¢ Support each other and show the world what creator collaboration really looks like

âœ… What You Need to Do Now:
ğŸ“¥ Sign up here: https://forms.gle/n57LtAEJnXwbbYtv5
ğŸ§­ Make sure your TikTok profile is set up for LIVE (must meet platform requirements)
ğŸ“¢ Be ready to go live, support your fellow creators, and have fun with it!

ğŸ’¡ Pro Tip:
Want to stand out? Use your stream to hype up the next creator with energy, vibes, or a mini countdown before your handoff. Show the viewers itâ€™s all connected ğŸ’«

Letâ€™s raid. Letâ€™s grow. Letâ€™s GO.

#InfinitumLIVE #TikTokRaidChain #CreatorFamily #SupportCreators

title: Important Reminder to All Infinitum LIVE Creators ğŸ“£
description:
Dear Creators,

We want to take a moment to thank you for your continued trust and dedication as a member of the Infinitum LIVE Creator Network. Our community thrives because of your commitment, creativity, and loyalty â€” and we are proud to support you every step of the way.

However, it has come to our attention that some creators have been contacted by outside networks or individuals attempting to poach or lure creators away from our community. Please understand:

ğŸ”’ This is a direct violation of both TikTok LIVE policy and your agreement with Infinitum LIVE Creator Network.

â— Entertaining offers, conversations, or invitations from other networks while contracted with Infinitum is strictly prohibited. These actions are not only a breach of contract, but they can result in serious consequences for both the creator and the violating network.

ğŸš« If You Leave Due to Poaching:
The violating agency will be reported to TikTok.
That agency will receive violation points, which may lead to the termination of their agency status with TikTok.
Infinitum will pursue legal action against any individual or entity who violates our agreements or attempts to disrupt the integrity of our network.

ğŸš« If a Creator in Our Network Starts Their Own Agency:
This is a breach of contract and will result in termination from Infinitum LIVE.
It will also trigger legal enforcement actions, including possible claims for damages, as outlined in the agreement you signed.

We do not take these matters lightly. Our contracts are legally binding, enforceable, and designed to protect the time, effort, and trust we all put into this network.

ğŸ¤ Need Help or Have Questions?
If you're ever unsure, uncomfortable, or just need support â€” please reach out to your assigned manager or email us directly at support@infinitumlive.com. We are here for you. Always.

Thank you again for being a valued part of the Infinitum family. Together, we grow stronger. ğŸ’

â€” Infinitum LIVE Creator Network
Owned and operated by creators, for creators.

title: Apply as Mentor to prove yourself to become a manager!
description:
Mentor Qualification Checklist â€“ Path to Becoming a Manager

Trial Period: 1 Month (3 Month Maximum time to complete) (Compensation: $20 per creator who meets the requirements)

To successfully transition from a mentor to a manager, you must complete the following:

Recruitment: Enroll a minimum of 20 new creators into the network. [Apply here](https://infinitumlive.com/creator-pre-check/)

Performance Goals: At least 3 out of the 20 recruited creators must achieve:
â€¢ 10 valid days
â€¢ 20 hours of live streaming
â€¢ 100,000 diamonds

Creator Development: Actively collaborate with your recruits to identify areas for growth and provide strategic guidance to help them improve their performance on LIVE.

Support & Resources: Ensure creators receive the necessary support by providing them with relevant documents, guides, and materials from our Discord community.

Mentor Requirement: Must complete 7 valid days and 15 hours a month on their own personal account each month.

### Transition to Manager Role

Once you successfully transition to a manager, you will be sent the Official Creator Agreement and the Manager Pay Policy, outlining your responsibilities, compensation, and additional benefits as a manager.

title: TikTok LIVE - Understanding 1099-K Tax Forms
description: The Internal Revenue Service (IRS) requires US payment processors, including TikTok Inc., to file and send you a 1099-K if the payment processor has transferred more than $20000 and 200 transactions to you during the year. Otherwise check your paypal for Tax forms.

title: HIGH-END RECRUITING BONUS (FEB-MARCH 2025)
description:
**MARK: Documentation Overview**

- **Active Recruit:** Indicates whether the recruiter status is active (YES or NO).
- **Tier:** Designates the level or rank (e.g., Rookie).
- **Valid Days:** Total number of days that the current status remains valid (e.g., 7).
- **Hours:** Represents allotted or tracked hours during the valid period (e.g., 15).
- **Diamonds REQ:** Specifies the required diamonds or points (e.g., 20,000).
- **Pay:** Denotes the monetary payout for this tier and status (e.g., $10).

**Sample Entry:**
- Active Recruit: YES
- Tier: Rookie
- Valid Days: 7
- Hours: 15
- Diamonds REQ: 20,000
- Pay: $10 (1,000 diamonds)

Have them apply here: [Apply Now](https://infinitumlive.com/creator-pre-check/)

title: [New] Team Match Mode Coming Soon
description:
Go 1v2 or 1v3 with other creators using *team match!

Hi everyone! We have exciting new team match combinationsâ€”1v2 and 1v3â€”currently being tested on TikTok LIVE. 90% of creators will have access starting today (2.13) and we anticipate all creators to have access before the end of February.

For more information on accessing the new team match combinations and a preview of the UI, check out the attached one-pager.

Feel free to share any questions or feedback you may have or receive on this new match mode! We're eager to continue optimizing and improving the match experience on TikTok LIVE.

**FAQ:**

**Q:** I do not have access to new team match modes. When will I receive access?

**A:** We anticipate you will receive access in the next 2 weeks, before the end of February!

**Q:** Do 1v2 or 1v3 wins count towards a match win streak?

**A:** Currently, team match wins do not count towards a win streak. However, we are working on updating this capability in the future.

title: TikTok is back in the app store!
description: TikTok Is back in the appstores and you can now update it again!

title: Delete TikTok? Or having issues?
description: If you are an android user you can still update your TikTok App, check it out! iOS users can use the website via their phone (They built a web version)
